Name: width
Desc: Gets or sets the width of the first node.
LongDesc: Controls the width dimension of elements. When called without parameters, returns the current width of the first element in the set including padding and border (offsetWidth). When provided with a value, sets the CSS width property for all elements in the set, accepting values in pixels, percentages, or other CSS units. This method provides a convenient way to manage element dimensions programmatically.
